statements: SELECT song_name, artist_name, num_streams FROM music_streaming_statistics WHERE song_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM music_streaming_statistics WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT artist_name, song_name FROM music_streaming_statistics WHERE num_streams > 1000 ORDER BY num_streams DESC;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, release_date FROM music_streaming_statistics WHERE artist_name = 'Ed Sheeran';
SELECT song_name, num_streams FROM music_streaming_statistics WHERE release_date < '2022-03-15' ORDER BY num_streams DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_streaming_statistics ORDER BY num_streams DESC, release_date ASC
SELECT song_name, artist_name, num_streams FROM music_streaming_statistics WHERE num_streams > 100000
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs FROM music_streaming_statistics GROUP BY artist_name ORDER BY total_songs DESC
SELECT * FROM music_streaming_statistics WHERE release_date >= '2021-01-01' AND release_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT artist_name, AVG(num_streams) AS avg_streams FROM music_streaming_statistics GROUP BY artist_name HAVING avg_streams > 50000
SELECT * FROM music_streaming_stats;
SELECT artist_name, stream_count FROM music_streaming_stats WHERE stream_count > 1000;
SELECT song_name, artist_name, stream_count FROM music_streaming_stats ORDER BY stream_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_streams FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE total_streams < 500;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY last_streamed_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_streaming_stats ORDER BY stream_count DESC, artist_name ASC
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM music_streaming_stats WHERE stream_count > 1000
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_songs FROM music_streaming_stats GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_songs > 5
SELECT user_id, total_streams, total_likes FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE last_streamed_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_likes DESC
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY last_streamed_at DESC, total_streams
SELECT * FROM song_statistics;
SELECT song_id, num_streams, num_likes FROM song_statistics ORDER BY num_streams DESC;
SELECT user_id, num_likes_given FROM user_statistics WHERE num_likes_given > 100;
SELECT user_id, song_id, action_type FROM user_activity WHERE action_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, song_id, action_type FROM user_activity WHERE action_type = 'like' ORDER BY user_id, song_id;
SELECT song_id, num_streams, num_likes FROM song_statistics ORDER BY num_streams DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_statistics WHERE num_login > 100 AND num_likes_given < 50;
SELECT song_id, COUNT(song_id) AS num_actions FROM user_activity GROUP BY song_id HAVING num_actions > 10 ORDER BY num_actions DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(num_login) AS total_login FROM user_statistics GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_login DESC;
SELECT user_id, song_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE action_type = 'like' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM song_streams;
SELECT user_id, stream_count FROM song_streams ORDER BY stream_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT artist_id, total_streams FROM artist_engagement WHERE total_streams > 1000;
SELECT playlist_id, user_id FROM playlist_data ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM song_streams ORDER BY stream_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_streams FROM song_streams GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_streams > 1000 ORDER BY total_streams DESC;
SELECT artist_id, total_streams, total_followers FROM artist_engagement WHERE total_streams > 100000 AND total_followers > 50000 ORDER BY total_streams DESC, total_followers DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, date_registered FROM user_profile WHERE date_registered >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT song_id, user_id, stream_count FROM song_streams WHERE stream_count BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY stream_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM song_statistics;
SELECT song_id, plays, likes FROM song_statistics WHERE plays > 100;
SELECT artist_id, total_plays, total_likes FROM artist_statistics ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_likes, total_downloads FROM user_statistics WHERE total_downloads < 50;
SELECT playlist_name, total_songs FROM playlists WHERE total_songs >= 10;
SELECT * FROM song_statistics ORDER BY plays DESC, likes ASC, downloads DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT song_id, SUM(plays) AS total_plays, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(downloads) AS total_downloads FROM song_statistics GROUP BY song_id;
SELECT playlist_name, total_songs FROM playlists WHERE total_songs > 50 ORDER BY total_songs DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_plays) AS total_plays, SUM(total_likes) AS total_likes, SUM(total_downloads) AS total_downloads FROM user_statistics GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_plays DESC;
SELECT artist_id, total_plays, total_likes, total_downloads FROM artist_statistics WHERE total_plays > 100 ORDER BY total_likes DESC, total_downloads ASC;
